multiFactorAuthDescription: Set up a Multi-Factor Authentication method to further secure your account
updateProfileError: An error occurred. Please try again
updatePasswordSuccessMessage: Your password has been updated successfully!
updatePasswordError: An error occurred. Please try again
name: Your Name
nameDescription: This will be shown in your profile
calendarDescription: Add the link of your calendar to be shown in your assigned projects
accountImageDescription: This will be shown in your profile.
profilePictureSubheading: Choose a photo to upload as your profile picture.
updatePasswordCardDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure.
repeatPasswordDescription: Please repeat your new password to confirm it
updateEmailCardDescription: Update the email address you use to log into your account
updateEmailSuccessMessage: We've sent an email to confirm your new address. Please check your inbox and click the link to confirm.
updateEmailError: Email not updated. Please try again
passwordNotMatching: Passwords do not match. Ensure you're using the correct password
emailNotMatching: Emails do not match. Ensure you're using the correct email
emailsNotMatching: Emails do not match. Ensure you're using the correct email
updatingSameEmail: The chosen email is the same as the current one
cannotUpdateEmail: You cannot update your email because your account is not linked to any.
cannotUpdatePassword: You cannot update your password because your account is not linked to any.
confirmUnlink: You are about to unlink this account.
unlinkActionError: Sorry, we couldn't unlink this account
linkActionError: Sorry, we couldn't link this account
multiFactorSetupErrorDescription: Sorry, there was an error setting up your factor. Please try again.
multiFactorAuthHeading: Protect Your Account with Multi-Factor Authentication
multiFactorModalHeading: Use your authentication app to scan the QR code below. Then enter the generated code.
factorNameLabel: A memorable name to identify this factor
factorNameHint: Use an easy-to-remember name to identify this factor in the future. E.g., iPhone 14
factorsListErrorDescription: Sorry, we couldn't load the factors list. Please try again.
mfaEnabledSuccessDescription: Congratulations! You have successfully enrolled in multi-factor authentication. You can now access your account using a combination of your password and an authentication code sent to your phone.
updatePhoneNumberSubheading: Link your phone number to your account
updatePhoneNumberError: Sorry, we couldn't update your phone number
confirmRemovePhoneNumberDescription: You are about to remove your phone number. You will not be able to use it to log into your account.
verifyActivationCodeDescription: Enter the verification code generated by your authentication app
qrCodeErrorDescription: Sorry, we couldn't generate the QR code
invalidVerificationCodeDescription: The verification code you entered is invalid. Please try again.
unenrollFactorModalDescription: You are about to unenroll this factor. You will not be able to use it to log into your account.
unenrollFactorModalBody: You are about to unenroll this factor. You will not be able to use it to log into your account.
selectFactor: Choose a Factor to Verify Your Identity
disableMfaError: Sorry, we encountered an error. MFA has not been disabled.
sendEmailVerificationLinkError: Sorry, we couldn't send you the email
verifyEmailAlertHeading: Please Verify Your Email to Enable MFA
verificationLinkAlertDescription: Your email is not yet verified. Please verify your email to set up multi-factor authentication.
authFactorNameHint: Assign a name that helps you remember the phone number used
dangerZoneDescription: Some actions cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
deleteAccountDescription: This will delete your account and any organizations you own. Additionally, we will cancel any active subscriptions immediately. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAccountErrorHeading: Sorry, we couldn't delete your account
needsReauthenticationDescription: You need to reauthenticate to change your password. Please log out and log back in to change your password.
languageAgencyDescription: Choose your preferred language for your agency
connectToStripeDescription: Connect your account to Stripe to enable billing and payments
stripeConnectedDescription: Your account is connected to Stripe. You can now create products, generate checkouts, and view your invoices directly from our platform.
continueWithOnboardingStripeDescription: Your account has not yet completed the onboarding process with Stripe. Please finish onboarding to enable all billing and payment features.
stripeNotConnectedDescription: You have not yet connected your account to Stripe. Connect to manage products, services, and process payments on our platform.
brandColorDescription: Select the color that represents and defines your brand identity.
brandLogoDescription: Upload a logo that represents your brand. A transparent background is recommended. Recommended size: 1280x400 pixels.
brandDarkLogoSelectLabel: Select a Logo for dark themes
brandDarkLogoDescription: Upload a logo for dark themes that represents your brand. A transparent background is recommended. Recommended size: 1280x400 pixels.
brandFaviconDescription: Upload a favicon that represents your brand. Recommended size: 256x256 pixels.
brandNameDescription: Select the name that represents your brand.
brandSenderNameDescription: Update the name that will be displayed as the sender of the emails
brandSenderEmailAndDomainDescription: Update the email and domain that will be displayed as the sender of the emails

treli.connectDescription: Connect your account with Treli to enable payments by this method.
treli.usernameDescription: This is your treli API username.
treli.passwordDescription: This is your treli API password.

loomAppIdDescription: Enter your Loom App ID to enable Loom integration. Copy your organization subdomain in your developer Loom app
